text: Mézières is a municipality of the district of Glâne in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. On 1 January 2004, the former municipality of Berlens merged into the municipality of Mézières.Nomenklaturen – Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 4 April 2011 == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Municipalities in Glâne
title: Mézières, Fribourg
